title: Shade and the Black Hat
lyrics:
Shade and the black hat don't tell me
i've paid my regards pouring in wine
what i've seen it tears me inside
can they hear me when i speak



my knees bowed



who fell here time away



shame married to go towards



don't tell me i've paid my regards



pouring in wine what i've seen



it tears me apart can they hear me



when i speak my tongue's tied.
